history.content: The deadline to withdraw for refund is June 21st for section C, and the deadline to drop for full refund is July 2nd. So if you drop one but not all of your section C classes by July 2nd, you'll get full refund for that class. But if you want to drop all classes, meaning withdrawing, from section C with full refund, then I think you have to it by June 21st. You might want to contact Berkeley summer program to clarify how much refund you'd get if you withdraw after the deadline.

So right now I am enrolled in two classes but plan on dropping one of them later. The Add Courses, Drop Courses, or Withdraw from Summer Sessions (with refund). deadline is July 2, so if i drop one of my classes before then I can get a full refund right? Does this also mean fees will be refundable as well before july 2? or is the deadline for that june 21.
history.subject: Question about summer class fees and deadline
